name: Message Center API
description:
Message Center corresponds to [order transactional email templates](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/order-transactional-email-templates--3g2S2kqBOoSGcCaqMYK2my). The store can configure templates to automatically send emails to customers and notify them about their order events, such as payment confirmation and shipping. 

## Message Center API Index 

### DKIM configuration

- `POST` [Generate DKIM keys](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/message-center-api#post-/api/mail-service/pvt/providers/-EmailProvider-/dkim)
